welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Legionowo, a charming city nestled in the beautiful countryside of Poland. Known for its historic architecture and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mazury Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Modlin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Modlin Airport, catering to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi for free for up to 30 minutes.
